item.myths_and_legends.adamant_orb.descr: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.aurora_ticket.des: A ticket required to board the ship to Birth Island.
item.myths_and_legends.azure_flute.descr: A flute that emits a clear tone that summons Arceus.
item.myths_and_legends.blue_orb.descript: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.myths_and_legends.bonus_disk.descri: A mysterious disk with unknown content.
item.myths_and_legends.clear_bell.descri: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.
item.myths_and_legends.dna_splicer.descr: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon together.
item.myths_and_legends.eon_ticket.descri: A ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island.
item.myths_and_legends.griseous_orb.desc: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.gs_ball.descripti: A mysterious Poké Ball. It has something to do with the Mythical Pokémon Celebi.
item.myths_and_legends.jade_orb.descript: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Johto region.
item.myths_and_legends.liberty_pass.desc: A pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.
item.myths_and_legends.lustrous_orb.desc: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.member_card.descr: An odd card which is needed to enter the Inn in Canalave City.
item.myths_and_legends.oaks_letter.descr: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
item.myths_and_legends.old_sea_map.descr: A chart that can be used to navigate to Faraway Island, where Mew is said to reside.
item.myths_and_legends.red_orb.descripti: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.myths_and_legends.rusted_shield.des: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.myths_and_legends.rusted_sword.desc: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.myths_and_legends.tidal_bell.descri: A bell capable of summoning Lugia from the depths of the Whirl Islands when rung.
item.myths_and_legends.dr_fujis_diary.de: Dr. Fuji's diary, filled with records of his research on Mew and the resulting creation of Mewtwo.
item.myths_and_legends.rainbow_wing.desc: A strange feather that gleams in rainbow colors.
item.myths_and_legends.scarlet_book.desc: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Sada” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.myths_and_legends.silver_wing.descr: A strange feather that gleams with a silvery color.
item.myths_and_legends.violet_book.descr: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Turo” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.myths_and_legends.cocoon_of_destruc: A mysterious item that holds the power of destruction.
item.myths_and_legends.sapling_of_life.d: A magical sapling embodying the essence of life.
item.myths_and_legends.zygarde_cube.desc: An item in which Zygarde Cores and Cells are gathered.
item.myths_and_legends.mystery_box.descr: A box that seems to attract a certain mysterious Pokémon.
item.myths_and_legends.reveal_glass.desc: A looking glass that reveals the true nature of the Therian Forces of Nature.
item.myths_and_legends.dark_stone.descri: A stone filled with dark, powerful energy, linked to the Legendary Pokémon Zekrom.
item.myths_and_legends.light_stone.descr: A stone radiating a pure light, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Reshiram.
item.myths_and_legends.teal_mask.descrip: A mysterious mask associated with the Pokémon Ogerpon, radiating a soft, teal glow.
item.myths_and_legends.sun_flute.descrip: A flute that glows with the light of the sun, capable of summoning Solgaleo.
item.myths_and_legends.moon_flute.descri: A flute that shines with the light of the moon, used to call upon Lunala.
item.myths_and_legends.lunar_feather.des: A feather that glows with a gentle lunar light, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Cresselia.
item.myths_and_legends.magma_stone.descr: A stone that holds intense heat, tied to the Legendary Pokémon Heatran.
item.myths_and_legends.diancies_crown.de: A glittering crown, connected to the Mythical Pokémon Diancie.
item.myths_and_legends.fini_totem.descri: A sacred totem, representing the power of the Guardian Deity Tapu Fini.
item.myths_and_legends.genesect_drive.de: A powerful drive designed to modify the attacks of Genesect.
item.myths_and_legends.grassland_blade.d: A mystical blade connected to the Legendary Pokémon Virizion.
item.myths_and_legends.hoopa_ring.descri: A golden ring tied to the mischievous powers of the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa.
item.myths_and_legends.ironwill_sword.de: A sword imbued with the unwavering will of the Legendary Pokémon Cobalion.
item.myths_and_legends.koko_totem.descri: A sacred totem, representing the power of the Guardian Deity Tapu Koko.
item.myths_and_legends.lele_totem.descri: A sacred totem, representing the power of the Guardian Deity Tapu Lele.
item.myths_and_legends.lillies_bag.descr: A mysterious bag used by Lillie, said to hold great secrets.
A headset used by the Mythical Pokémon Meloetta, resonating with musical power.
item.myths_and_legends.necro_prism.descr: A dark prism holding the power of Necrozma.
item.myths_and_legends.prism_bottle.desc: A bottle infused with rainbow light, linked to the Pokémon Hoopa.
item.myths_and_legends.sacred_sword.desc: The Sacred Sword wielded by the Mythical Pokémon Keldeo.
item.myths_and_legends.steam_valve.descr: A valve that controls immense pressure, tied to the Legendary Pokémon Volcanion.
item.myths_and_legends.type_null_mask.de: A mask once worn by Type: Null to control its immense power.
A rare Pokéball from a long-forgotten era.
item.myths_and_legends.eternatus_core.de: The core of the Legendary Pokémon Eternatus, brimming with energy.
item.myths_and_legends.kubfus_band.descr: A training band worn by the Legendary Pokémon Kubfu.
item.myths_and_legends.marshadow_hood.de: A shadowy hood worn by the Mythical Pokémon Marshadow.
item.myths_and_legends.plasma_tablet.des: A tablet infused with plasma energy, connected to Regieleki.
item.myths_and_legends.prismatic_shell.d: A shining shell imbued with the light of a thousand prisms.
item.myths_and_legends.reins_of_unity.de: The reins used to unite Calyrex with Glastrier or Spectrier.
item.myths_and_legends.scaly_tablet.desc: A stone tablet with scales carved into its surface, connected to Regidrago.
item.myths_and_legends.scroll_of_water.d: A scroll that teaches the secrets of water, used by Urshifu.
item.myths_and_legends.soul_heart.descri: A mystical heart infused with the spirit of the Mythical Pokémon Magearna.
item.myths_and_legends.zarudes_cape.desc: A rugged cape worn by the Legendary Pokémon Zarude.
item.myths_and_legends.zeraoras_thunderc: A claw crackling with electric energy, connected to Zeraora.
item.myths_and_legends.ancient_tablet.de: A tablet from ancient times, with braille on it.
item.myths_and_legends.mythical_pecha_be: A rare Pecha Berry imbued with mythical energy.
item.myths_and_legends.scroll_of_darknes: A scroll that teaches the secrets of darkness, used by Urshifu.
item.myths_and_legends.azelf_fang.descri: A sharp fang connected to the Legendary Pokémon Azelf.
item.myths_and_legends.mesprit_plume.des: A delicate plume from the Legendary Pokémon Mesprit.
item.myths_and_legends.stone_tablet.desc: A tablet carved from stone, tied to Regirock.
item.myths_and_legends.uxie_claw.descrip: A sharp claw belonging to the Legendary Pokémon Uxie.
item.myths_and_legends.ice_tablet.descri: A frozen tablet, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Regice.
item.myths_and_legends.steel_tablet.desc: A metal tablet, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Registeel.
item.myths_and_legends.bulu_totem.descri: A sacred totem, representing the power of the Guardian Deity Tapu Bulu.
item.myths_and_legends.cavern_shield.des: A sturdy shield, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Terrakion.
item.myths_and_legends.iceroot_carrot.de: Produce that the King of Bountiful Harvests' beloved steed likes to eat. It grew in a field covered in snow.
Produce that the King of Bountiful Harvests' beloved steed likes to eat. It grew in a gloomy field.
command.myths_and_legends.inventory_chec: Inventory of player %s has been checked.
command.myths_and_legends.no_pokemon: %s has no Pokémon in their party.
commands.myths_and_legends.not_have_poke: %s does not have a %s in their party.
commands.myths_and_legends.setblockcheck: %s does not have a %s in their party.
chat.broadcast.ultrabeast: Warning: An Ultra Beast has been detected!
